trans-unit.source: Extends design-time behavior for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Estende o comportamento de tempo de design para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref> controle de servidor Web.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control can be resized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref> controle pode ser redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the data list has templates; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a lista de dados possui modelos; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> object associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"> </xref> objeto associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"></xref> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatCollection"> </xref> associado a este designer.

trans-unit.source: Creates a template editing frame using the specified verb.
trans-unit.target: Cria um modelo usando o verbo especificado do quadro de edição.

trans-unit.source: Rather than using editing frames, use template groups and designer editing regions.
trans-unit.target: Em vez de usar a edição de quadros, use designer edição regiões e grupos de modelos.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb"></xref> for which to create the template editing frame.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb"> </xref> para o qual criar o quadro de edição de modelos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner"></xref> object and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner"> </xref> de objeto e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: When `disposing` is `true`, the Dispose method releases all resources held by the managed objects that this <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner> object references.
trans-unit.target: Quando `disposing` é `true`, o método Dispose libera todos os recursos mantidos por objetos gerenciados que este <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner>referências de objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListDesigner>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both the managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only the unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar os recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas os recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached template editing verbs available to the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o modelo em cache editando verbos disponíveis para o designer.

trans-unit.source: Rather than using editing frames, use template groups and designer editing regions.
trans-unit.target: Em vez de usar a edição de quadros, use designer edição regiões e grupos de modelos.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb"></xref> objects consisting of the cached template editing verbs that are available to the designer.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz de <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateEditingVerb"> </xref> consiste o modelo em cache editando os verbos que estão disponíveis para o designer de objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML used to represent the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o HTML usado para representar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The HTML that is used to represent the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"></xref> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O HTML que é usado para representar o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList"> </xref> controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML used to represent an empty template-based control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o HTML usado para representar um controle vazio com base em modelo no tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The HTML used to represent an empty template-based control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O HTML usado para representar um controle vazio com base em modelo no tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Gets the HTML to display at design time for the specified exception when an error has been encountered while rendering the control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o HTML para exibir em tempo de design para a exceção especificada quando um erro foi encontrado ao processar o controle.

trans-unit.source: The exception that occurred.
trans-unit.target: A exceção que ocorreu.

trans-unit.source: The HTML displayed at design time for the specified exception.
trans-unit.target: O HTML exibido em tempo de design para a exceção especificada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.System%23Web%23UI%23IDataItemContainer%23DataItem%2A> property of the template container.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.System%23Web%23UI%23IDataItemContainer%23DataItem%2A> propriedade do recipiente de modelo.

trans-unit.source: The GetTemplateContainerDataItemProperty method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O método GetTemplateContainerDataItemProperty está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: To access the template metadata, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar os metadados de modelo, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateDefinition>

trans-unit.source: The name of the template.
trans-unit.target: O nome do modelo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.System%23Web%23UI%23IDataItemContainer%23DataItem%2A> property of the container of the template.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataListItem.System%23Web%23UI%23IDataItemContainer%23DataItem%2A> propriedade do contêiner do modelo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the content of the template.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o conteúdo do modelo.

trans-unit.source: Rather than using editing frames, use template groups and designer editing regions.
trans-unit.target: Em vez de usar a edição de quadros, use designer edição regiões e grupos de modelos.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame"></xref> instance from which to get the content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame"> </xref> instância da qual obter o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The name of the template.
trans-unit.target: O nome do modelo.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the template's content can be edited; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the content is read-only.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o conteúdo do modelo pode ser editado; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> se o conteúdo é somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: The content of the template.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo do modelo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the designer with the specified component.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o designer com o componente especificado.

trans-unit.source: The control element being designed.
trans-unit.target: O elemento de controle que está sendo criado.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source to which the underlying control is bound loads a new schema.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando a fonte de dados ao qual está associado o controle subjacente carrega um novo esquema.

trans-unit.source: Override the OnSchemaRefreshed method to perform additional actions that might be required when new schema becomes available.
trans-unit.target: Substitua o método OnSchemaRefreshed para executar ações adicionais que podem ser necessárias quando o novo esquema torna-se disponível.

trans-unit.source: Called when the template editing verbs change.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando alterar os verbos de edição de modelo.

trans-unit.source: Rather than using editing verbs, use template groups and designer editing regions.
trans-unit.target: Em vez de usar os verbos de edição, use designer edição regiões e grupos de modelos.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: Sets the content for the specified template and frame.
trans-unit.target: Define o conteúdo para o modelo especificado e o quadro.

trans-unit.source: Rather than using editing verbs, use template groups and designer editing regions.
trans-unit.target: Em vez de usar os verbos de edição, use designer edição regiões e grupos de modelos.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame"></xref> instance for which to set the content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ITemplateEditingFrame"> </xref> instância para o qual definir o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The name of the template.
trans-unit.target: O nome do modelo.

trans-unit.source: The new content for the template.
trans-unit.target: O novo conteúdo para o modelo.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether there are templates defined for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se há modelos definidos para o controle associado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the associated control has templates defined; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controle associado possui modelos definidos; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
